name: Ramen
prep_instructions: Cut the onion in big chunks and the green onions, garlic and ginger in small pieces
Cut the Bok Choy and the Shiitake Mushrooms in long cuts
Prepare an Anise Star in an infusion object
Put the water to boil and insert the Vegetable Broth Cube
instructions: In a big pot, heat up the olive oil and cook the onion, green onions, garlic and ginger for 2 min until golden
Add the tomato paste and cook for another 2 min, while stirring
Add the vegetable broth and the coconut milk and bring to boiling point
When boling point is achieved, bring down the fire to medium power and add the bok choy, shiitake mushrooms and the anise star
Add the miso paste, soy sauce, sesame oil, salt and pepper
Stir and let simmer for 25-45 min, check taste 2 or 3 times to adjust salt
Meanwhile, cook the dry ramen noodles in another pot with boiling water and rinse with fresh water when done
When the broth and the noodles are ready, serve together in a bowl with any extra topings
notes: Feel free to customize toppings according to your preference, such as adding nori seaweed, bamboo shoots, or chili oil for extra flavor.
